name: Pepperoni
description: Breaded, pan-fried chicken is topped with tomato sauce, pepperoni, and mozzarella cheese then baked for a cheesy, family-friendly dinner.

name: Farmhouse
description: An Italiano Pizza that goes Ballistic on Veggies! Overloaded with mouth watering, crunchy, crisp capsicum, succulent grilled mushrooms, fresh tomatoes, corn, olives, jalepenos, farm-fresh cottage cheese and tasty onions.

name: Veggie Paradise
description: Tops a Crisp Whole Grain Crust with Fresh Veggies. Hot, cheesy golden corn paired with Black Olives gives it the perfect taste, spiced with fresh Capsicum, Red & Yellow Paprika and Parsley

name: Mushroom Fiesta
description: Fluffy, Bready and Crispy crust topped with Button Mushrooms and paired with Chicken slices. Delicious, creamy Onion rings and Capsicum give it the tangy taste, which goes perfectly with the golden crispy and thick base.

name: Indie Chicken Tikka
description: Cheesy Indian Pizza topped with delicious Chicken Tikka. The exotic tastes of the spices and chicken pairs beautifully with the cheesy pizza. Additionally flavoured with Red Paprika and Mushroom makes it scrumptious.

name: Classic Veg Burger
description: Veg Patties sandwiched in Burger buns. Seasoned with Signature Sauce and combined with spices, corn, and root-based vegetables. Topped with crispy lettuce and onion giving a savory, smoky and classic taste.

name: Classic Non-Veg Burger
description: Classic Chicken Patties sandwiched in between Burger buns. Stuffed with finely ground chicken patties, a little lettuce and tomato, flavoured with Mint Mayo to enhance the classic burger taste.

name: Paneer Burger
description: Indian Style Paneer patties in Burger buns. Soft patties made of fresh Indian cottage cheese (Paneer), topped with crispy lettuce and onion, sandwiched in burger buns, flavoured with Marinara Sauce for the perfect moist bite.

name: Double Patty-Chicken
description: Ground Barbeque Chicken Patties sandwiched in between Burger buns. Loaded with finely ground chicken patties, lettuce and onion for crispy bites, seasoned with rich Barbeque sauce for the perfect flavour.

name: Aloo Tikki Burger
description: Indian style Potato patties in Burger buns. Crisp golden patties, made from mashed potatoes and peas, sandwiched in burger buns, and then topped with veggies and spiced with chutneys.

name: Chocolate Donut
description: Moist and Fluffy Donuts that are baked with full of chocolate. Covered in a thick chocolate glaze, these are perfect for chocoholic who wants a chocolate version of this classic treat

name: Strawberry Donut
description: Soft and Cakey Donuts, perfectly moist with milk and yogurt. Dipped into strawberry frosting and finished off with a shower of red sprinkles
